5#ifndef V8_OBJECTS_ALLOCATION_SITE_H_
6#define V8_OBJECTS_ALLOCATION_SITE_H_
7
8#include "src/objects/objects.h"
9#include "src/objects/struct.h"
10
11// Has to be the last include (doesn't have include guards):
12#include "src/objects/object-macros.h"
13
14namespace v8 {
15namespace internal {
16
17enum InstanceType : uint16_t;
18
19#include "torque-generated/src/objects/allocation-site-tq.inc"
20
21class AllocationSite : public Struct {
22 public:
23 NEVER_READ_ONLY_SPACE
24 static const uint32_t kMaximumArrayBytesToPretransition = 8 * 1024;
25
26 // Values for pretenure decision field.
27 enum PretenureDecision {
28 kUndecided = 0,
29 kDontTenure = 1,
30 kMaybeTenure = 2,
31 kTenure = 3,
32 kZombie = 4, // See comment to IsZombie() for documentation.
33 kLastPretenureDecisionValue = kZombie
34 };
35
36 const char* PretenureDecisionName(PretenureDecision decision);
37
38 // Contains either a Smi-encoded bitfield or a boilerplate. If it's a Smi the
39 // AllocationSite is for a constructed Array.
40 DECL_ACCESSORS(transition_info_or_boilerplate, Tagged<Object>)
41 DECL_RELEASE_ACQUIRE_ACCESSORS(transition_info_or_boilerplate, Tagged<Object>)
42 DECL_GETTER(boilerplate, Tagged<JSObject>)
43 DECL_RELEASE_ACQUIRE_ACCESSORS(boilerplate, Tagged<JSObject>)
44 DECL_INT_ACCESSORS(transition_info)
45
46 // nested_site threads a list of sites that represent nested literals
47 // walked in a particular order. So [[1, 2], 1, 2] will have one
48 // nested_site, but [[1, 2], 3, [4]] will have a list of two.
49 DECL_ACCESSORS(nested_site, Tagged<Object>)
50
51 // Bitfield containing pretenuring information.
52 DECL_RELAXED_INT32_ACCESSORS(pretenure_data)
53
54 DECL_INT32_ACCESSORS(pretenure_create_count)
55 DECL_ACCESSORS(dependent_code, Tagged<DependentCode>)
56
57 // heap->allocation_site_list() points to the last AllocationSite which form
58 // a linked list through the weak_next property. The GC might remove elements
59 // from the list by updateing weak_next.
60 DECL_ACCESSORS(weak_next, Tagged<Object>)
61
62 inline void Initialize();
63
64 // Checks if the allocation site contain weak_next field;
65 inline bool HasWeakNext() const;
66
67 // This method is expensive, it should only be called for reporting.
68 bool IsNested();
69
70 // transition_info bitfields, for constructed array transition info.
71 using ElementsKindBits = base::BitField<ElementsKind, 0, 6>;
72 using DoNotInlineBit = base::BitField<bool, 6, 1>;
73 // Unused bits 7-30.
74
75 // Bitfields for pretenure_data
76 using MementoFoundCountBits = base::BitField<int, 0, 26>;
77 using PretenureDecisionBits = base::BitField<PretenureDecision, 26, 3>;
78 using DeoptDependentCodeBit = base::BitField<bool, 29, 1>;
79 static_assert(PretenureDecisionBits::kMax >= kLastPretenureDecisionValue);
80
81 // Increments the mementos found counter and returns the new count.
82 inline int IncrementMementoFoundCount(int increment = 1);
83
84 inline void IncrementMementoCreateCount();
85
86 AllocationType GetAllocationType() const;
87
88 void ResetPretenureDecision();
89
90 inline PretenureDecision pretenure_decision() const;
91 inline void set_pretenure_decision(PretenureDecision decision);
92
93 inline bool deopt_dependent_code() const;
94 inline void set_deopt_dependent_code(bool deopt);
95
96 inline int memento_found_count() const;
97 inline void set_memento_found_count(int count);
98
99 inline int memento_create_count() const;
100 inline void set_memento_create_count(int count);
101
102 // A "zombie" AllocationSite is one which has no more strong roots to
103 // it, and yet must be maintained until the next GC. The reason is that
104 // it may be that in new space there are AllocationMementos hanging around
105 // which point to the AllocationSite. If we scavenge these AllocationSites
106 // too soon, those AllocationMementos will end up pointing to garbage
107 // addresses. The concrete case happens when evacuating new space in the full
108 // GC which happens after sweeping has been started already. To mitigate this
109 // problem the garbage collector marks such AllocationSites as zombies when it
110 // discovers there are no roots, allowing the subsequent collection pass to
111 // recognize zombies and discard them later.
112 inline bool IsZombie() const;
113
114 inline bool IsMaybeTenure() const;
115
116 inline void MarkZombie();
117
118 inline bool MakePretenureDecision(PretenureDecision current_decision,
119 double ratio, bool maximum_size_scavenge);
120
121 inline bool DigestPretenuringFeedback(bool maximum_size_scavenge);
122
123 inline ElementsKind GetElementsKind() const;
124 inline void SetElementsKind(ElementsKind kind);
125
126 inline bool CanInlineCall() const;
127 inline void SetDoNotInlineCall();
128
129 inline bool PointsToLiteral() const;
130
131 template <AllocationSiteUpdateMode update_or_check =
132 AllocationSiteUpdateMode::kUpdate>
133 static bool DigestTransitionFeedback(Handle<AllocationSite> site,
134 ElementsKind to_kind);
135
136 DECL_PRINTER(AllocationSite)
137 DECL_VERIFIER(AllocationSite)
138
139 DECL_CAST(AllocationSite)
140 static inline bool ShouldTrack(ElementsKind boilerplate_elements_kind);
141 static bool ShouldTrack(ElementsKind from, ElementsKind to);
142 static inline bool CanTrack(InstanceType type);
143
144 // Layout description.
145 // AllocationSite has to start with TransitionInfoOrboilerPlateOffset
146 // and end with WeakNext field.
147 #define ALLOCATION_SITE_FIELDS(V) \
148 V(kStartOffset, 0) \
149 V(kTransitionInfoOrBoilerplateOffset, kTaggedSize) \
150 V(kNestedSiteOffset, kTaggedSize) \
151 V(kDependentCodeOffset, kTaggedSize) \
152 V(kCommonPointerFieldEndOffset, 0) \
153 V(kPretenureDataOffset, kInt32Size) \
154 V(kPretenureCreateCountOffset, kInt32Size) \
155 /* Size of AllocationSite without WeakNext field */ \
156 V(kSizeWithoutWeakNext, 0) \
157 V(kWeakNextOffset, kTaggedSize) \
158 /* Size of AllocationSite with WeakNext field */ \
159 V(kSizeWithWeakNext, 0)
160
161 DEFINE_FIELD_OFFSET_CONSTANTS(HeapObject::kHeaderSize, ALLOCATION_SITE_FIELDS)
162 #undef ALLOCATION_SITE_FIELDS
163
164 class BodyDescriptor;
165
166 private:
167 inline bool PretenuringDecisionMade() const;
168
169 OBJECT_CONSTRUCTORS(AllocationSite, Struct);
170};
171
172class AllocationMemento
173 : public TorqueGeneratedAllocationMemento<AllocationMemento, Struct> {
174 public:
175 DECL_ACCESSORS(allocation_site, Tagged<Object>)
176
177 inline bool IsValid() const;
178 inline Tagged<AllocationSite> GetAllocationSite() const;
179 inline Address GetAllocationSiteUnchecked() const;
180
181 DECL_PRINTER(AllocationMemento)
182
183 using BodyDescriptor = StructBodyDescriptor;
184
185 TQ_OBJECT_CONSTRUCTORS(AllocationMemento)
186};
187
188} // namespace internal
189} // namespace v8
190
191#include "src/objects/object-macros-undef.h"
192
193#endif // V8_OBJECTS_ALLOCATION_SITE_H_
